Meanwhile, the U.S.A should continue to maintain a strong military presence in the region to deter further aggressive actions from China. The U.S.A should also consider deploying additional unmanned defense systems to supplement the existing manned systems and improve response times to threats.

Deploying additional unmanned defense systems can help manage the multiple threats and reduce the workload on the naval crew, thereby improving their situational awareness and response times.
